content: this is a simple chunky weight take on the norwegian protest hat it uses garter stitch instead of ribbing for the brim you seam that together in a circle and pick up one side to knit the top of the hat if you re feeling fancy you can do a provisional cast on and kitchener the ends together instead sized to fit a 20 22 24 head plain version 80 90 100 yards folded brim version 100 110 120 yards
